links.title: Saber Capital 4Q17 Letter: 2017 Review, Apple, and Tencent - InvestorAlmanac
links.description: Saber Capital Management Letter to Investors: 2017 Review, February 15, 2018 In 2017, portfolio gained 30.7% gross (25.3% net) vs. S&P 500 gain of 21.8% 3 biggest drivers were Apple, Verisign, and Tencent; gained 46%, 50%, and 114% respectively in 2017 Selling Too Early It was a mistake to sell our bank basket (JPM and BAC).

messages.body: $AAPL https://www.cnbc.com/2018/02/16/apple-aapl-stock-gbhs-dan-ives-says-the-panic-is-over.html

links.title: Look for Apple's upcoming buybacks, services and China business to vault the stock, says analyst
links.description: Andrew Burton | Getty Images Wall Street is apparently done panicking over Apple. And now that the stock has bounced back from recent lows, three of the company's advantages - popularity in China, a growing services business and a war chest of cash - provide a clear path forward, according to GBH Insights analyst Dan Ives.

messages.body: Morgan Stanley: iPhone X Is Winning Market Share In China https://benzinga.com/z/11208468 $AAPL

links.title: Morgan Stanley: Apple (NASDAQ:AAPL) iPhone X Is Winning Market Share In China
links.description: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ: AAPL)'s revenue from China is closely watched by investors and Wall Street analysts, and the latest data points from the world's biggest smartphone market reinforces a bullish stance on the stock, according to Morgan Stanley. Morgan Stanley's Katy Huberty maintains an Overweight rating on Apple's stock with an unchanged $203 price target.
